text: The Seven-Ups is a 1973 American action crime mystery movie directed by first time director Philip D'Antoni and stars Roy Schedier, Tony Lo Bianco, Larry Haines, Richard Lynch, Joe Spinell. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 action movies Category:1973 crime movies Category:1973 mystery movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:1970s American crime movies Category:American mystery movies
title: The Seven-Ups
